{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ThinkFlood |model=RedEye |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/19/2009 |manuf_country=USA |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=remote control relay |fcc_id=W33RE0001 |ic_id=5595B-RE0001 |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT91SAM9260 |cpu1_cspeed=210 |fla1= |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT??8PBI2-FW263 |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S561632J-UC75 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=ZyDAS |wi1_chip1_model=ZD1211B |wi1_chip2_brand=Ubec |wi1_chip2_model=UW2453 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:23:87 }} '''RedEye Pro Networked Home Automation Controller''' This device is using an ''Atheros'' branded ZD1211B (AR2524). OUI is per the FCC sample label. Receives commands via Wi-Fi, re-transmits them via infrared (IR)
to various IR-controlled devices in the home (TV, home theater etc). [http://www.engadget.com/2011/04/05/thinkflood-intros-redeye-pro-networked-home-automation-controlle/ On '''engadget''']
